com.opensymphony.workflow.spi.ofbiz
Class OfbizWorkflowStore

java.lang.Object
  com.opensymphony.workflow.spi.ofbiz.OfbizWorkflowStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkflowStore
public class OfbizWorkflowStore
extends Object
implements WorkflowStore

OpenForBusiness Entity Engine implemenation.

Has one optional property that can be provided:

  • delegator - the delegator name, defaults to "default"

Author:
Pat Lightbody
